articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.title: Palworld creator wants to avoid "big-budget triple-A games" in the future as the hit survival game's profits are "too big for a studio with our size to handle" - Gamesradar
articles.description: Pocketpair is remaining small amid Palworld's giant success
articles.content:
Palworld's creator wants the development studio to stay small because "big-budget triple-A games are not for us."
Palworld certainly performed like a big-budget blockbuster as the monster-taming sur… [+1946 chars]
